Name: Shenanigans
About the game: Are you tired of losing board games because those damn rules get in your way? You don't have to be! Unleash the Shenanigans and change the rules of the game in your favor. Combine arbitrary events and actions to create new rules or simply remove the ones you don't like! Set up traps for your opponents and try to secure your victory by all means. Or just make it your mission to cause total chaos! After all, there are no rules. Features Collect and play cards to perform actions, or add, modify or remove rules to change the gameplay in your favor. Spice up the game with emotes, explosion and spark effects, and draw around on the board. Customize the game to your liking with fully customizable settings, card decks and characters. Destroy your friendship in chaotic games of up to 8 players.
